resources.string: Your UIM card is PUK-locked. Type the PUK code to unlock it.
Type PUK2 to unblock UIM card.
Allows application to read SMS messages stored on your tablet or UIM card. Malicious applications may read your confidential messages.
Allows application to read SMS messages stored on your phone or UIM card. Malicious applications may read your confidential messages.
Allows application to write to SMS messages stored on your tablet or UIM card. Malicious applications may delete your messages.
Allows application to write to SMS messages stored on your phone or UIM card. Malicious applications may delete your messages.
The UIM card is missing or not readable. Please insert a UIM card.
Your UIM card is permanently disabled.\n Please contact your wireless service provider to obtain another UIM card.
The mobile network will be unavailable until you restart with a valid UIM card inserted.
